description:
Versatile pants that are up for living life on the rugged side. Cut for movement with a gusseted crotch and articulated knees, the Rural Camp Pants are a natural pick for dry weather camping and climbing. Organic cotton canvas and utility styling means they’ll play nice with sneakers and a tee for urban adventures too.Made of durable organic cotton canvas with a hint of spandex for stretch.2 front hand pockets and 2 back pockets.Gusseted crotch and articulated knees give you room to move.Fair Trade Certified. Your purchase of this item supports better working conditions for the factory workers who made it. For each product sold, they earn a premium to increase their earnings and fight poverty in their communities.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: MEC Rural Camp Pants - Men's
